com.nsqre.insquare.Activities

Class LoginActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        • android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
          • com.nsqre.insquare.Activities.LoginActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompatApi23.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener

    public class LoginActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks
    This is the first activity the user will see. This activity deals with the login, taking tokens from Facebook or Google, sending them to the back-end and elaborating the InSquareProfile
    See Also:
    InSquareProfile

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void facebookPostRequest()
      This method creates a POST request to the backend to manage Facebook login The backend answers with data that are used in json2login

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        The OnCreate method of LoginActivity deals with the initialization of Google Analytics, the InSquareProfile data stored locally and if they're not present gives the user the possibility to login via Facebook or Google

      • json2login

        private void json2login(java.lang.String jsonUser)
        This method initializes the values of the InSquareProfile
        Parameters:
        jsonUser - the json string that represents the user
        See Also:
        InSquareProfile

      • launchInSquare

        private void launchInSquare()
        This method is called after the login is considered successful. It creates an intent to BottomNavActivity to open the map or the ProfileFragment, depending on the extras that are put in it.
        See Also:
        BottomNavActivity
